title: Construction costs for selected airports up to 2012
summary: This is a bar chart representing Airport in the x axis and Costs in billion euros in the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The Costs in billion euros of Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) is 5.3% smaller than the maximum value at Hong Kong (China).
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Airport, and Costs in billion euros in each Airport on the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airport in the x axis and Costs in billion euros in the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
The Costs in billion euros of Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany) is 5.3% smaller than the maximum value at Hong Kong (China).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airport in the x axis and Costs in billion euros in the y axis.
The Costs in billion euros is highest at Airport Hong Kong (China) and lowest at Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
Airport Kansai/Osaka (Japan) has the second highest value for Costs in billion euros.
There is a difference of 12.9 between the maximum Airport Hong Kong (China) and minimum Airport Berlin-Brandenburg (Germany).
Costs in billion euros at Airport Hong Kong (China) is 15.9 , second place is Kansai/Osaka (Japan) at 15.9, and thirdly is Doha (Katar) at 8.8.
Airport Hong Kong (China), and Kansai/Osaka (Japan) have a similar Costs in billion euros that is 15.9.
The highest value 15.9 at Hong Kong (China) is almost 1.7 times larger than the average value 9.35.
The Costs in billion euros is 56.1 if we add up values of all Airports.
